full_summary:
### Global Partnership for Education Knowledge & Innovation Exchange Development and Implementation of a Communications and Engagement Strategy

**Tender Reference:**
* CB-759-17412917
* Amendment: 1

**Solicitation Details:**

* **Notice Title:** Development and Implementation of a Communications and Engagement Strategy for the GPE-KIX
* **Notice Publication Date:** April 22, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** May 10, 2024, 13:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** May 17, 2024

**Project Overview:**
The International Development Research Centre (IDRC) is seeking a proposal from a qualified consultant to support the development and implementation of a refreshed Communications and Engagement Strategy for the Global Partnership for Education Knowledge & Innovation Exchange (GPE-KIX). The GPE-KIX is a key initiative focused on improving education outcomes in developing countries. The proposed strategy and workplan should guide IDRC's GPE-KIX program-level efforts from 2024-2027.

**Scope of Work:**

The chosen consultant will work closely with IDRC and GPE staff to:

* Develop a refreshed Communications and Engagement Strategy for GPE-KIX
* Create a workplan to guide GPE-KIX program-level efforts from 2024-2027
* Implement the strategy and workplan, as outlined in the Statement of Work (Services)

**Key Responsibilities:**

* Design and implement a comprehensive Communications and Engagement Strategy for GPE-KIX
* Develop a workplan to guide program-level efforts from 2024-2027
* Collaborate with IDRC and GPE staff to implement the strategy and workplan

**Contact Information:**

* Name: Lindsay Empey
* Email: lempey@idrc.ca
* Phone: (613) 408-1843

**Tender Documents:**

The tender notice and related documents can be accessed at: 
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/36490/rfp24250002_1.pdf
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/36490/ddp-no-24250002.pdf
